page.title: 11HOME LIFE: R.S.P.C.A.HOME
page.content: The R.S.P.C.A. home in Rookley is at Bohemia Corner. It takes in any stray animals. The warden, who runs it, lives in the grounds and has 3 people to help him. The kennels are quite spacious so that the animals have room to run around. The helpers have not got time to walk the dogs; that is why spacious kennels are important. At the home there is an orchard which is used as a sound barrier because people used to complain that the animals were making too much noise. Some of the animals are boarders which means their owners are away from home. If you want to buy an animal a dog would cost Â£12 and a cat would cost Â£5.
